resources.string: This service records pop ups sent by your mobile operator, and saves them in XXXX App. It is absolutely safe to use.

string-array.name: test_list
string-array.item: PPS makes a call to visit country (+CC), Call(B), EndCallAfter(10)
PPS makes a call to Thailand (+CC), Call(D), EndCallAfter(10)
PPS makes a call to 3rd country (+CC), Call(C), EndCallAfter(10)
PPS makes a call to Thailand (08xxxx)Feel Like Home=Active, CallNumber(0802395690), EndCallAfter(10)
PPS makes a call to IR forbidden number, CallNumber(+35567231), EndCallAfter(10)
PPS makes a call to IR forbidden number, CallNumber(0035567231), EndCallAfter(10)
PPS send sms IR (to local), SMS(0935850635)
PPS send sms IR (to +CCxxx 3rd country), SMS(0622210140)
PPS make call forward uncondition (A->B->C) -> B is roaming,Call(C), EndCallAfter(10), USSD(*21*0935850635)
